review: I chose to purchase the Google Chromecast after reading several great reviews. Unfortunately, this product only worked as it should for about 3 months. We constantly lose the Chromecast connection -- it was so aggravating that we just went and bought the $50 HDMI adapter for our iPhone. We have done the manufacturer hard reset, the soft button reset on the actual Chromecast and have had our internet connection increased to the fastest speed with a new router to ensure that wasn't the issue. So now we are in the process of waiting for a Google rep to contact us pertaining to the replacement of the product. Honestly, I would just save the money and buy the HDMI adapter for your phone and call it a day. The hassle of the product doesn't outweigh the benefit!
